articles.author: Pragativadi News Service
articles.title: European Satellite 'Aeolus' To Fall Through Earth's Atmosphere, ESA Aims At Safe Landing - Pragativadi
articles.description: A 1,360-kilogram satellite is set to fall through Earth's atmosphere and may crash on the planet soon. The satellite, Aeolus, is a European Space Agency (ESA) spacecraft launched in August 2018 as an Earth Explorer research mission.In order to ensure
